constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough
KEYACH Tolworth Key Area of Change

decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 3 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 20/01859/PAO2R. Therefore, the submitted details would fail to ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 4 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission 20/01859/PAO2R the proposal fails to ensure satisfactory refuse facilities in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Cycle Parking) and 4 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission 20/01859/PAO2R (Change of use of ground floor Office (Class B1) to 2no. x one bed flats (Class C3) and installation of 2no.x South facing windows.)  Class O, Part 3 of Schedule 2 in the Town and Country Planning Order 2015.
